Text: O̩ma-mi, nyʼibe-mi eti,
kʼuwe̩ ki fejute̩ ibe eñwa,
Todu iño̩ akito̩ kwʼuko onobule̩ ejaduña,
i muda lewa ukpoji-wñ i alikoko dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩ge̩le̩,
E̩te̩-wñ agwo̩ru nyʼef uku;
tode̩gba kʼibe-wñ atʼo̩na e-iñmi;
Todule̩ amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, me̩ nanetirʼo̩la-mi,
Mʼo̩na-me̩ rida bʼo̩ te̩ tʼo̩najiji,
tode̩gba kʼe̩ dʼojima-we̩ ñw abo omune̩
tode̩gba kʼefu abo̩wo̩ ejaduña ako̩ ñw e̩wñ anana e-we̩,
kʼe̩ la kwoññ e̩gba ukpoji-we̩ otitala,
uwe̩ la kakini, U te̩tache ulaka e̩wñ ku ma ko̩ mi,
U la gbʼomu abo ku ma ko̩ mi e̩wñ gbo̩ n
E̩wñ bie̩ne̩ du kʼomi ma dʼefu-wñ n
E̩ nañmʼomi kwʼef obuga e-we̩ onugo,
I dukpe̩ kʼe̩bi omi-we̩ ki fiatuka rʼo̩do̩da,
I ki chʼutodu e-we̩ kate,
E̩bi omi-we̩ ki chʼe̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ ade̩nyo̩ ñw u,
dabe̩ne̩ kʼegbi kʼi nyo̩ ego kpai ole-wñ kʼi chʼuto̩ eju.
Todu e̩wñ chʼe-we̩, o̩ma-mi, kʼe̩ laʼonobule̩ o̩wo̩ ejaduña ubi?
Todu o̩na du kʼone̩ ale tejugede eju Jihofa,
Agbo̩ni e̩ne̩bibi amu owñ onugo,
I aku todu uko̩ o̩la ki nyarʼu,
